description: creates / deletes a Linode Public Cloud instance and optionally waits for it to be 'running'.

alert_diskio_enabled.description: Set status of receiving disk IO alerts.

payment_term.description: payment term to use for the instance (payment term in months)

alert_bwquota_enabled.description: Set status of bandwidth quota alerts as percentage of network tranfer quota.

private_ip.description: Add private IPv4 address when Linode is created.

ssh_pub_key.description: SSH public key applied to root user

backupweeklyday.description: Integer value for what day of the week to store weekly backups.

displaygroup.description: Add the instance to a Display Group in Linode Manager

alert_bwout_enabled.description: Set status of bandwidth out alerts.

state.description: Indicate desired state of the resource

alert_bwin_enabled.description: Set status of bandwidth in alerts.

kernel_id.description: kernel to use for the instance (Linode Kernel)

alert_bwin_threshold.description: Set threshold in MB of bandwidth in alerts.

alert_cpu_enabled.description: Set status of receiving CPU usage alerts.

linode_id.description: Unique ID of a linode server

alert_diskio_threshold.description: Set threshold for average IO ops/sec over 2 hour period.

wait_timeout.description: how long before wait gives up, in seconds

plan.description: plan to use for the instance (Linode plan)

password.description: root password to apply to a new server (auto generated if missing)

wait.description: wait for the instance to be in state 'running' before returning

datacenter.description: datacenter to create an instance in (Linode Datacenter)

name.description: Name to give the instance (alphanumeric, dashes, underscore)

alert_cpu_threshold.description: Set percentage threshold for receiving CPU usage alerts. Each CPU core adds 100% to total.

distribution.description: distribution to use for the instance (Linode Distribution)

alert_bwquota_threshold.description: Set threshold in MB of bandwidth quota alerts.

alert_bwout_threshold.description: Set threshold in MB of bandwidth out alerts.
